excerpt: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. photo by Jacqueline Clair via The Glam Pad
text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. After almost summer-like temps and sunshine two weeks ago, this past week was quite the opposite… cold, rainy and grey all week. I love a rainy day, but not a whole week. When searching online for links this week, I made sure to find homes and ideas infused with lots of happy colors that I hope you enjoy. Even in the gloom, the best two contractors got together and finally got the living room ceiling completed. It was supposed to be done right after Christmas. I will share more about this week. Now onto the links I found for you this week. Posts You May Have Missed This Week: My 12+ Must Do Faux Flower Decorating Tips (open in same tab) Something to Think About Take your younger self out for coffee. (open in same tab) “Never let anyone — any person or any force — dampen, dim, or diminish your light.” – John Lewis If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. Post navigation
html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

After almost summer-like temps and sunshine two weeks ago, this past week was quite the opposite… cold, rainy and grey all week. I love a rainy day, but not a whole week. When searching online for links this week, I made sure to find homes and ideas infused with lots of happy colors that I hope you enjoy.

Even in the gloom, the best two contractors got together and finally got the living room ceiling completed. It was supposed to be done right after Christmas. I will share more about this week.

Now onto the links I found for you this week.

Posts You May Have Missed This Week:

  • My 12+ Must Do Faux Flower Decorating Tips (open in same tab)

Something to Think About

Take your younger self out for coffee. (open in same tab)

“Never let anyone — any person or any force — dampen, dim, or diminish your light.” – John Lewis

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
